title: Power Type
description:
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.
Type: 'origins:prevent_block_use'
- Prevents the usage (i.e. right-clicking) of blocks for a player. For example, this could be used to make a player not able to open a furnace or chest, not use composters, or not use a button.

block_condition.description: If specified, only blocks that fulfills this condition is affected
